item.title: Bangladesh Army chief stresses professionalism, impartiality in election duties
item.description: Chief of Army Staff General Waker-Uz-Zaman on Tuesday stressed the importance of performing duties with professionalism, impartiality, discipline, patience and a citizen-friendly approach....

item.title: Bangladesh govt okays education in Rohingya camps via UNICEF
item.description: Bangladesh government has approved a proposal to procure education services through UNICEF to improve pre-primary and primary education for forcibly displaced Myanmar nationals, commonly known as Rohingyas, living in Coxâ€™s Bazar and Bandarban districts, as well as Bhasan Char in Noakhali......Bangladesh travel guides

item.title: Muslims observe Shab-e-Barat
item.description: Muslims across Bangladesh are observing the holy night of Shab-e-Barat with prayers throughout the night following Tuesday, while graveyards have been decorated with lights as devotees seek forgiveness for the departed souls......
